alert.note: Alert for Bland; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Tazewell, northwestern Bland, southwestern Summers, and Mercer counties through 215 PM EDT... At 140 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ellison to Amonate. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bluefield... Princeton... Tazewell... Athens... Matoaka... Rocky Gap... and Camp Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
